overview: Being creative and taking your own path in skiing is one that rings very true with Legs of Steel, so it is an honour to have worked and filmed this year with such a close-knit and handpicked team of riders. This is something that the crew will always strive to have at the heart of the project, and continuing to work with an increasing network of talented friends who you are just as likely to be having a beer with at the house in Innsbruck as you are trusting with your life on some crazy line or feature will always be a priority.
tagline: This year Legs of Steel are going back to their roots, releasing a no rules ski movie produced by the crew, for the crew. Expect fire, and black-magic ski action all wrapped up in their own unique brand of stunning cinematography.
title: The LOSt
